steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text that you want to adjust the indents for.
Click on the 'Page Layout' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Paragraph' group, click on the 'Indent' button.
From the drop-down menu, select 'Increase Indent' or 'Decrease Indent' to adjust the indents as desired.
Alternatively, you can use the keyboard shortcuts 'Ctrl+M' to increase indent and 'Ctrl+Shift+M' to decrease indent.
Review the changes and make any additional adjustments if needed.
